title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: LCD of  fraction, 5 over, y plus 3,  , , fraction, 2 over, y minus 3,  , and , fraction, 5 over, y squared minus 9,   is  parentheses y plus 3,  times, parentheses y minus 3,  .
pacedSpeech: LCD of   fraction, 5 over, y plus 3,
, and  , fraction, 5 over, y squared minus 9,
is    y plus 3,  times,  y minus 3,

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$5\left(y-3\right)+2\left(y+3\right)=5$$
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  5 times, parentheses y minus 3,  plus, 2 times, parentheses y plus 3,  is equal to 5
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get   5 times,  y minus 3,  plus, 2 times,  y plus 3,  is equal to 5

title: Simplify the Equation
text: Let's simplify this equation: $$5y-15+2y+6=5$$. This simplifies to $$7y=14$$
speech: Let's simplify this equation:  5 y minus 15 plus 2 y plus 6 is equal to, 5 . This simplifies to  7 y, is equal to 14

. This simplifies to   7 y, is equal to 14

title: Solve the Equation
text: $$7y=14$$ can be solved as $$y=2$$. This solution is not extraneous.
speech: 7 y is equal to 14  can be solved as  y, is equal to 2 . This solution is not extraneous.
